subject: application connection problem
description_text: Hello, my pedals simsonn pro x are correctly connected in Windows, but they appear disconnected in the Simsonn Manager application. Could you please help me quickly, as I have special events coming up in a competition? Please see photo above.

conversations.body_text: Hi Dominique CASTEL,    ProX / ProX Ultra Pedal Firmware Update Procedure:    Press and hold the Upgrade button on the control box;    Reconnect the USB cable;    The software will indicate that the device has entered “Simsonn Flasher mode”;    In the software, go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-proxultra.sfu (If it’s a ProX pedal, select pedals-prox.sfu)    Start the firmware update, and once it is complete, release the Upgrade button;    Finally, retest and calibrate the pedals.    Note: Make sure to use the USB 3.0 port on the back of your PC and avoid USB hubs to ensure stable power and proper device recognition.
